name: Rabbit -- Chat Mod
description:
Modifies Rabbit Chat

= Makes the chat wider
= Fixes issues with long messages having the sides cut off
= Changes the color of your messages from orange to purple, for improved readability
= Enlarges images posted in chat
= Makes chat text selectable
= Fixes issues with some messages having the bottom cut off
